Articles.Content: it's driving me crazy, i'm doing everything fine but apoapsis and my speed are changing like crazy even though my engines are off, seriously wtf?
push "." to enter 5x timewarp and everything should settle down.

push "." to enter 5x timewarp and everything should settle down.

it says "cannot warp time while ship is under acceleration" something like that
Post screenshots of the craft that's giving you problems and we can help you figure out why it's acting up.

Post screenshots of the craft that's giving you problems and we can help you figure out why it's acting up.

this one http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/78852-Want-to-go-to-Eve-and-back-Try-this

Oh my. Might I suggest "moar struts!" In all seriousness though, the ship is probably just doing some wobbling. Be patient, keep trying to do a 5x timewarp, and it will eventually settle down.

Edited August 10, 2014 by Otis

Oh my. Might I suggest "moar struts!" In all seriousness though, the ship is probably just doing some wobbling. Be patient, keep trying to do a 5x timewarp, and it will eventually settle down.

alrighty, and also do you think it is possible to get to eve and back with this ship?

if not, do you have any other?

alrighty, and also do you think it is possible to get to eve and back with this ship?

if not, do you have any other?

Manned missions to Eve with a landing and return to Kerbin are the absolute, no-doubt about it, hardest missions possible in the stock KSP system. I think that craft will work, but there are others that might be easier. Take some of tavert's designs from this thread into consideration. :

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36419-Smallest-Craft-to-Various-Milestones

You'll find that they are easier to control and your computer will thank you for the lower part counts. The big thing is choosing landing sites carefully, and saving fuel and delta-v in any way possible. Brute force will work, but sometimes it actually makes the mission more difficult.

edit : this post in particular show just how far you can push minimalist designs : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36419-Smallest-Craft-to-Various-Milestones?p=648598&viewfull=1#post648598

Edited August 10, 2014 by Otis
